index-1: Hello, my name is Matěj and I am a student at Faculty of Information Technology at Brno University of Technology.
index-2: In my free time I'm a freelance web developer, but I also focus on my hobbies such as elecronics or camping
index-3: If you need a website for you or to jumpstart your business just click
exp-1: I am programming since I was 15 and since then I learned not only languages like C++ or Rust, but web technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Vue.js and Nuxt.js as well.
exp-2: Here is a list of what I've learned so far:
offer-1: I'll turn your idea of your ideal website into relity, even if you don't know exactly what you need.
offer-2: I'll help you find best web hosting for you, so you don't pay too much and I'll help you set everything up and explaing everything you'll need/want to know.

my-projects.title: My projects
my-projects.desc: In my free time I work on different not only software, but also hardware projects. You can see what I'm comfortable with showing here:

p1.title: First experience with AVR
p1.desc: I've decided to try to do something with AVR microcontroller, so I used it to print text to LCD.

p1.title: My website
p1.desc: I made my website using HTML, CSS with TailwindCSS, JavaScript libraries Vue.js and Nuxt.js
p1.p1: Because I've decided to learn a JavaScript framework, it seamed like a good idea to make a personal website.
p1.p2: I started with the landing page and that's where I wanted to leave it, but I§ve decided to make aditional page to show off my projects.
p1.p3: It's not like there's a lot to see... for now, because I don't want to show unfinished projects in case I don't finish them.
